dmp.title: DMP for Impact of social media on suicide rates

dataset.title: Source Code
dataset.description: Preprocessing and correlation analysis with provenance validation, Embargoed until licence->start_date below
data_quality_assurance: Provenance notebook created to validate produced outputs with the reference outputs to validate the runtime environment.

security_and_privacy.title: read access
security_and_privacy.description: Read access of the repository will be allowed to anyone

security_and_privacy.title: write access
security_and_privacy.description: Write access into the repository will be allowed only to whitelisted contributors and handled via github repository management

dataset.preservation_statement: Is preserved to allow reproducibility of the experiment, reference files to promote validation will also be kept

dataset.title: Produced data
dataset.description: Preprocessing and correlation analysis with provenance validation, Embargoed until licence->start_date below

distribution.title: Dataset in CSV format, Figures in PNG format

data_quality_assurance: Data is sanitized, missing values are removed to ensure not swaying of results in certain years.
Custom naming convention present in README.md was used

security_and_privacy.title: read access
security_and_privacy.description: Read access of the repository will be allowed to anyone

security_and_privacy.title: write access
security_and_privacy.description: Write access into the repository will be allowed only to whitelisted contributors and handled via github repository management

dataset.preservation_statement: Even though the data can be recreated by re-run of the experiment the output dataset is retained for future reference in case the experiment is no longer runnable due to deprecation of the technologies used.
